name: MKCompassButton
desc: A specialized view that displays the current compass heading for its associated map.

items.name: init(mapView: MKMapView?)
items.desc: Creates a compass button and associates it with the specified map view.

items.name: var mapView: MKMapView?
items.desc: The map view that provides the heading information for the compass button.

items.name: var compassVisibility: MKFeatureVisibility
items.desc: The visibility of the compass button.

items.name: enum MKFeatureVisibility
items.desc: Constants that indicate the visibility of different map features.
